casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Todd Joseph MARTIN 390P12-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Sherri Horner Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Craig M. Cooley, Attorney at Law, Cary, Todd Joseph Martin, for Martin, Todd Joseph.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of April 2019 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
